description: This story is about a MathBook feeling sad due to its many problems and a Calculator trying to offer support.
title: The Problematic Equation
n_1: MathBook sits heavily on the desk, its pages burdened with complex equations.
n_2: MathBook's pages flutter as it sighs, Calculator's screen flickers in concern.
n_3: A single tear falls from MathBook's page, Calculator displays a comforting message.
n_4: MathBook smiles slightly, Calculator shows a 'Problem Solved' message.
c1_1: Why must I have so many problems?
c2_1: Can I help you with some calculations?
c1_2: It's just too much, I feel overwhelmed.
c2_2: Let's solve them one by one. You're not alone.
c1_3: Thank you, I feel a bit better now.
c1_4: I guess it's not so bad when you have help.
c2_4: Exactly! No problem is too big for us.
